The `piratesAvatarShadow()` function provides a specialized implementation of shadow creation tailored for the local avatar in a 3D environment. It builds upon the general-purpose `avatarShadow()` function by enforcing a specific Level of Detail (LOD) setting, ensuring consistent visual quality when generating shadows for character models.

def piratesAvatarShadow():
    a = avatarShadow()
    # Force the lod to be 0 at all times
    base.localAvatar.getGeomNode().getChild(0).node().forceSwitch(0)
    return a
